headline: Vegan Sweet Potato Chickpea Curry
name: Vegan Sweet Potato Chickpea Curry
description: This chickpea curry recipe made with sweet potatoes, spinach, tomatoes, and coconut milk uses fragrant Indian spices to make a delicious vegan meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook onion, garlic, and ginger in hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes. Add chickpeas, tomatoes, coconut milk, and sweet potato. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
Season with garam masala, cumin, turmeric, salt, and chile flakes. Add spinach right before serving.
